import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import swal from 'sweetalert'; import { GlobalState } from '../../../../GlobalState'; const Category = () => { const state = useContext(GlobalState); const [token] = state.token; const [categories, setCategories] = state.categoryAPI.categories; const [callback, setCallback] = state.categoryAPI.categories; const [category, setCategory] = useState(''); const [onEdit, setOnEdit] = useState(false); const [id, setId] = useState(''); const createCategory = async (e) => { try { const res = await axios.post('/api/category', {name: category}, { headers: {Authorization: token} }) setCategory(''); setCallback(!callback); alert(res.data.msg); } catch (err) { alert(err.response.data.msg); } } const editCategory = async (id, name) => { setCategory(name); } return (
